docs.text:
Octave


Matrix 
1
 
2


 Initialize Matrix

 A = [ 1, 1, 2; 3, 5, 8; 13, 21, 32 ]
A =
    1    1    2
    3    5    8
   13   21   32


 Index Expression

 A(1, [1, 2])  # row 1, columns 1 and 2

 A(1, 1:2)     # row 1, columns in range 1-2

 A(1, : )       # row 1, all columns


 Transpose A

 A'
ans =
    1    3   13
    1    5   21
    2    8   32


 Inverse of the square matrix A

 inv(A)
ans =

   2.00000  -2.50000   0.50000
  -2.00000  -1.50000   0.50000
   0.50000   2.00000  -0.50000




Problem 1
: Transform labels vector to labels matrix


 Input
labels =
   1
   1
   3

 Output
labels =
   1   0   0
   1   0   0
   0   0   1




Two solutions


 Solution 1
num_labels = size(labels, 1)
out = zeros(num_labels, num_labels);
for i=1:num_labels
  out(i, labels (i)) = 1;
end


 Solution 2
num_labels = size(labels, 1)
out = eye(num_labels)(labels, : )




Known Issues


Plot window not responding










Simple Examples






18.2 Basic Matrix Functions






8.1 Index Expressions

num_labels = size(labels, 1)
out = zeros(num_labels, num_labels);
for i=1:num_labels

end  Solution 2

out = eye(num_labels)(labels, : )
